translation: Vạl th afsvs tas shkhṣh sndi khạṭr yus ʿạb pihran āshi, yus ghybt kran th ṭʿnh divan āshi.
Yus ghayt drjh ṭamʿ th ḥryṣ āshi, tamy āshi mal jmʿ kran, sue āshi grih grih gnzrụ̄ gnzrụ̄ thavan, (tmụ̄ sund yhi krnh andr chhu mʿlvm spdan kh)
Suh chhu guman kran th khyal thavan kh yhi amụ̄ sund mal pvshnavih amis yʿny zndh thavys hmyshh.
Thi banhi nh hrgz, (nh rvzi yhi shkhṣ th nh rvzi amụ̄ sund yhi mal v dvlt, qsmi khda) suh yiyhi dạrith dinh czhtth travvnis th kvuchhi kvuchhi krvnis nars andr.
Tohyhi kus chyz zạnhi ravih suh kvuchhi kvuchhi krvun nar kyah gvv? (bvuziv asụ̄ karv byan)
Suh chhu khdae sund sue nar yus thndi ḥukmh zalnh āmut chhu.
Yus nar bdnn sintụ̄ lgh vunue diln petth athr kri.
Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ suh nar āshi timn petth tthandd dinh āmut.
(tamikụ̄ drvazh āsn bnd krnh āmtụ̄ yymhi andr nh nyirthe hykhi kanhh, time āsn gndd krith thavnh āmtụ̄) narkyn zytthyn thmn sintụ̄.
